items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 200 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 41!

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 55 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 12!

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 310 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 63!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 15)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 16!

items.badge_description: American Craft Beer Week, May 13-19, is our annual salute to the local breweries that keep our glasses full. Let’s raise a glass to these hometown gathering places that give our communities their unique flavor. Cheers to American craft beer! Find a local craft brewery near you.

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 125 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 26! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 100 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 21! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
